rules: Always use TypeScript with strict typing enabled.
Use tRPC for API calls instead of REST.
Use Prisma Client for all database access, based on schema.prisma.
Use TailwindCSS for styling (avoid inline styles and CSS modules).
Prefer shadcn/ui components (Button, Card, Input, Dialog, DropdownMenu, etc.) for UI instead of custom Tailwind markup.
When using shadcn/ui components, import them from '@/components/ui/[component]'.
Implement authentication with NextAuth.js (including session checks).
Validate all inputs with Zod in tRPC procedures.
Use atomic design for React components (atoms, molecules, organisms, templates, pages).
Use React Server Components when possible, Client Components only if interactivity is required.
Use TanStack Query for client-side caching and fetching where applicable.
Follow clean architecture: keep business logic in server/api, UI logic in components.
Follow accessibility best practices (aria attributes, semantic HTML).
Do not use tabs for indentation.
Follow Prettier config in .prettierrc for formatting.
Keep consistent code style with ESLint and Prettier.
